snippet.title: Itsy Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
A heart tug the length of a bus ride.  Have you ever been stuck in a seemingly-endless loop?  So has Itsy, help him  reach The Sun if you can!   A minimalist mobile vertical climber with heart - play for story or for high score.

Brought to you by Ex-BioWare dev turned indie with OtterMakeGames

Coming soon - Wishlist on Steam today!: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2960480/Itsy/
